dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SJ 40 IS: Providing for congressional disapproval of the proposed export of certain defense articles to Israel.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sanders introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval of the proposed export of certain defense articles to Israel.

section.text: That the following proposed export to Israel is prohibited:

paragraph.text: The export of the following firearms, parts, and components controlled under Category I of the United States Munitions List in the amount of $1,000,000 or more and described in Transmittal No. DDTC 23–085, which was submitted to Congress pursuant to section 36(c) of the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2776(c)) and communication of which was published in the Congressional Record on March 24, 2025 (Executive Communication 511): 2,300 Colt M4 carbine, 11.5” barrel length, 5.56mm caliber, fully automatic rifles to M.R.D. Efram Investments Ltd in Israel for ultimate end use by the Israel National Police.
